channel.title: Spamming! Just Happened To Me!
channel.description:
I want to learn how to stop spammers in my server. I just had been spammed where the guy was making new guys and talking a very fast! My server and client lagged all the way. I thought of the Ipban command but i dont know how to make that. I am very new to code servers!
Can i please get some help!

item.title: Spamming! Just Happened To Me!
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

[quote=“johno2, post:3, topic:237279”]im my server ive got some commands, so if they log on with that name, it crashes there client LOL

HEHEHE[/quote]
You know that it won’t help against users who just null the shit out of you…?

Read full topic

item.title: Spamming! Just Happened To Me!
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

You should already have Ip ban. and its called SYIpkpker.
If its the AllGoFree bot IPban is 100% affective.
